title: Why Liberals Hate The Queen (Ep 1848)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking comments by deranged liberals about the death of Queen Elizabeth. 

News Picks:


Old case over audio tapes in Bill Clinton's sock drawer could impact Mar-a-Lago search dispute.


Prayers for Jonathan Turley After His Definitive Takedown of Hillary’s Latest ‘but My Emails’ Defense. 

White House claim Biden wasn't briefed on Trump investigation contradicted by National Archives.


Hunter Biden said he would be 'happy' to introduce business associates to top CCP official.

New York Governor Wants Credit Card Companies to Crackdown On Gun Sales.


It’s now clear that the Biden administration is leaking fake news to the media.


Ireland jails teacher who won't use students' preferred pronouns


Was the government right about anything involving COVID?

Is nuclear war inevitable?


Rumble makes another huge movement into the news space.
